org.xmlcml.cml.element
Interface ConnectionTable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AtomSetTool, BondSetTool, ConnectionTableImpl, GeometryTool, MoleculeTool, StereochemistryTool
public interface ConnectionTable

supports connection table for atom, molecule, bond.

Author:
pmr

partitionIntoMolecules

void partitionIntoMolecules()
                            throws CMLRuntime
splits a molecule with disjoint graphs into submolecules. does not use atomSet adds them as children to current molecule old molecule is destroyed new MolecularTool representing the split molecules

CMLRuntime

getAtom

CMLAtom getAtom(CMLBond bond,
                int i)
gets either atom in this. this requires the bond to have a molecule grandparent. if not, use getAtom(CMLMolecul, int)

Parameters:
bond -
i - the serial number 0 or 1
Returns:
the atom or null if no grandparent molecule, no atomRefs2 or bad i

deleteAtom

void deleteAtom(CMLAtom atom)
                throws CMLRuntime
Deletes the CMLAtom from the CMLAtom content of the CMLMolecule. If the atom is null, or in a different CMLMolecule, no action. Also deletes all bonds this atom was involved in (does not yet delete angles) NOTE: This does NOT check the validity of the CMLMolecule after deletion.

Parameters:
atom - the CMLAtom to delete
Throws:
CMLRuntime

deleteBond

void deleteBond(CMLBond bond)
                throws CMLRuntime
Removes the given bond from this molecule atoms are not deleted (they may be left without bonds)

Parameters:
bond - to remove
Throws:
CMLRuntime - if the bond doesnt belong to this molecule.

deleteAllAtoms

void deleteAllAtoms()
Delete all atoms. and bonds that reference them).

deleteAllBonds

void deleteAllBonds()
Deletes all Bonds (but not atoms in them).

flattenMolecules

CMLMolecule flattenMolecules()
Merges all submolecules' bond and atom arrays into a single molecule.

Returns:
the merged CMLMolecule

mergeMolecule

void mergeMolecule(CMLMolecule fromMolecule)
                   throws CMLException
adds a molecule to current molecule. adds atoms and bonds from fromMolecule, checking for uniqueness of IDs molecule to be added must share same owner document addMolecule is destroyed

Parameters:
fromMolecule - to be added (must share same owner document)
Throws:
CMLException - incompatible ids, owner document, etc.

generateAndSetId

creates and sets id for bond from atom ids. Bond id is of form atom1.getId_atom2.getId

Parameters:
bond -
Returns:
the bond id or null if cannot find atoms

Returns:

createSubMolecule

CMLMolecule createSubMolecule(CMLMolecule molecule,
                              java.lang.String[] atomIds)
                              throws CMLException
create a new CMLMolecule from a subset of a molecule. creates a CMLMolecule in new document. copies all bonds involving atoms in Idlist copies all attributes and all child elements recursively works (crudely) by completely copying the molecule and then deleting atoms and bonds

Parameters:
molecule - molecule to copy from
atomIds - to copy from molecule
Returns:
molecule
Throws:
CMLException

addBond

void addBond(CMLBond bond)
             throws CMLException
adds a bond to this CMLMolecule. should not be used unless you know what you are doing use createAndAddBond() where possible

Parameters:
bond - CMLBond to add
Throws:
CMLException - checks many aspects of bond

addAtom

void addAtom(CMLAtom atom)
             throws CMLException
adds an atom to this CMLMolecule. should not be used unless you know what you are doing use createAndAddBond() where possible

Parameters:
atom - to add
Throws:
CMLException - checks many aspects of atom

createUniqueAtomId

java.lang.String createUniqueAtomId()
create unique atom Id. iterates through atom IDs, taking first character as prefix and adding first integer that makes a unique ID

Returns:
the id

createAndAddAtom

CMLAtom createAndAddAtom()
create an atom in molecule context. this is likely to be the most commonly used constructor. The molecule will now owns this atom and the atom can reference it through getMolecule(). it also adds it as a child of the atomArray, creating this if necessary sets ID and adds atom

Returns:
CMLAtom atom
Throws:
CMLRuntime - ID not unique

generateBondIds

void generateBondIds()
generate unique ids for the bonds.

transferToMolecule

void transferToMolecule(CMLAtom atom,
                        CMLMolecule mol)
                        throws CMLException
Transfer atom to different molecule in same document. may be obsolete use with care. Normally only when merging two molecules As well as setting up the atom's owner molecule, it adds this atom to mol

Parameters:
atom -
mol - to add
Throws:
CMLException - duplicate atom Ids

transferToMolecule

void transferToMolecule(CMLBond bond,
                        CMLMolecule mol)
Set owner molecule. may be obsolete use with care. Normally only when merging two molecules

Parameters:
bond -
mol - to add (if null exits without action)

atomRef1 -
atomRef2 -
Returns:
the new bond
Throws:
CMLException - null atoms, atoms not in this CMLMolecule, bond already exists, identical CMLAtoms

                                 throws CMLException
Gets a typed List of all the atoms involved in the bond bond must have a grandparent moelcule

Parameters:
bond -
Returns:
a list of 2 atoms
Throws:
CMLException - if molecule is null, no atomRefs2 attribute or atom is not in molecule

addSuffixToAtomIDs

void addSuffixToAtomIDs(java.lang.String suffix)
                        throws CMLException
add suffix to atom IDs. Add a distinguishing suffix to all atom IDs this allows multiple copies of a fragment in a molecule

Parameters:
suffix -
Throws:
CMLException
